snippet.title: AVPC - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Gameplay teaser for the upcoming Karl Pilkington fan game A Very Pilkington Christmas. This game will be coming to PC and Mac for free at a later date. 

For game updates and release information, join the Pilkipedia Discord server:  https://discord.gg/CADkXZxxPJ

https://twitter.com/VeryPilkiXmas
